direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods generate HTML content, but outerHtml includes the element itself while html only includes the inner content.
Both methods extract content from elements, but text extracts plain text while outerHtml extracts HTML.
The toString method is an alias for outerHtml, making it directly substitutable for testing purposes.
Both methods manipulate the HTML structure of elements, with wrap adding an outer structure and outerHtml generating the existing outer structure.
The selectFirst method can be used to find elements that outerHtml would then generate HTML for, indicating a dependency on element selection.
